class=\"date published time\" title=\"2017-04-10T15:04:24+00:00\">4/10/17</span> </div><h2 class=\"entry-title\"><a href=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/orange-county/kids-cooking-classes-at-discovery-cube/\" rel=\"bookmark\">Healthy Kitchen Kids Cooking Classes at Discovery Cube</a></h2> \n<div class=\"entry-content\"><p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-20382 size-full\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Cooking-Classes-at-Discovery-Cube-OC.jpg\" alt=\"Healthy Kitchen Kids Cooking Classes at Discovery Cube\" width=\"650\" height=\"867\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Cooking-Classes-at-Discovery-Cube-OC.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Cooking-Classes-at-Discovery-Cube-OC-150x200.jpg 150w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\">&nbsp;if you don’t know that Discovery Cube OC has kids cooking classes…<em>you do&nbsp;now!</em> my kids LOVE to cook, and&nbsp;ever since we&nbsp;started watching Master Chef Junior as a family, they’ve wanted to learn how to be little chefs. so we certainly were very thrilled that the Petersonville <a href=\"http://oc.discoverycube.org/exhibits/healthy-kitchen/\" target=\"_blank\">Healthy Kitchen</a>&nbsp;has&nbsp;opened at <em>Discovery Cube OC</em>.</p>\n<p>the <strong>Healthy Kitchen</strong> offers 1-hour long kids cooking classes at Discovery Cube with a new recipe each month. there are multiple time slots offered on certain&nbsp;days of the week. you can make reservations or just ask the front desk at the Cube if there are any openings. most classes are $20 for a party of 4, so you can have up to 4 children or children and adults participate together. this includes the class and food that you will be making. the class is in&nbsp;addition&nbsp;to&nbsp;your admission into the Cube.</p>\n<p>the class begins with putting on an apron and a good hand washing.<img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-20396 size-full\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Washing-your-Hands-at-Discovery-Cube.jpg\" alt=\"Healthy Kitchen Kids Cooking Classes at Discovery Cube\" width=\"650\" height=\"650\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Washing-your-Hands-at-Discovery-Cube.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Washing-your-Hands-at-Discovery-Cube-200x200.jpg 200w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Washing-your-Hands-at-Discovery-Cube-100x100.jpg 100w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Washing-your-Hands-at-Discovery-Cube-180x180.jpg 180w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></p>\n<p>an instructor will help the kids with every step of the recipe and teach them not only how to prepare the food, but also the science behind each process. it’s like a bunch of science experiments. i love how the kids can see the instructor in detail on big television screens above and also in person in front of the class. i also like that there are only 6 stations, so the classes are small and intimate.<img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-20390 size-full\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Kids-Cooking-Instructor.jpg\" alt=\"Healthy Kitchen Kids Cooking Classes at Discovery Cube\" width=\"650\" height=\"894\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Kids-Cooking-Instructor.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Kids-Cooking-Instructor-145x200.jpg 145w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-20381 size-full\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Special-Classes-at-Discovery-Cube.jpg\" alt=\"Healthy Kitchen Kids Cooking Classes at Discovery Cube\" width=\"650\" height=\"894\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Special-Classes-at-Discovery-Cube.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Special-Classes-at-Discovery-Cube-145x200.jpg 145w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></p>\n<p>i think the class is great because the kids get to learn many different techniques on how to prepare food and also get to prep it, prepare it and eat it. at this class, we made <strong>Rainbow Wraps</strong>! we have also made gingerbread cupcakes in another class. both classes were equally fun.</p>\n<p>here are some photos of the boys cooking up their food…</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-20394 size-full\" class=\"entry-title\"><a href=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/eat/recipe-eat/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/\" rel=\"bookmark\">Knott’s Boysenberry Milkshake Recipe</a></h2> \n<div class=\"entry-content\"><p><a href=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/recipe/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/attachment/easy-knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/\" rel=\"attachment wp-att-20442\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-20442\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Easy-Knotts-Boysenberry-Milkshake.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"894\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Easy-Knotts-Boysenberry-Milkshake.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Easy-Knotts-Boysenberry-Milkshake-145x200.jpg 145w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Easy-Knotts-Boysenberry-Milkshake-150x206.jpg 150w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Easy-Knotts-Boysenberry-Milkshake-600x825.jpg 600w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></a></p>\n<p>the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/orange-county/knotts-boysenberry-festival/\" target=\"_blank\">Boysenberry Festival</a>&nbsp;is happening right now at&nbsp;Knott’s Berry Farm. it’s one of Knott’s most loved events of the year. there are over 80 different boysenberry foods to choose from boysenberry pizza to boysenberry cheesecake dipped in chocolate….YUM!!!! we had a great time when we visited on opening day. we started the day with a Fun Bun and ended it with a Boysenberry Icee. you can also buy boysenberry products at the Boysenberry Festival, such as boysenberry soap, boysenberry chapstick, boysenberry barbecue sauce and boysenberry jam. Boysenberry punch is a big deal at Knott’s, and you can buy the boysenberry punch concentrate to make your own at home. there is a lot of great boysenberry products available.</p>\n<p>so i decided to create a&nbsp;<strong>Knott’s Boysenberry Milkshake</strong>&nbsp;with some of the boysenberry products i received. monster milkshakes are all the rage right now….so what way to better celebrate the boysenberry festival, than with a monster boysenberry milkshake. to make it, i used the following items – Berry Market Boysenberry Preserves, Knott’s Berry Farm Boysenberry Punch Concentrate, Boysenberry Cotton Candy, and Boysenberry Honey.</p>\n<p><a href=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/eat/recipe-eat/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/attachment/knotts-boysenberry-products/\" rel=\"attachment wp-att-20422\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-20422\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Boysenberry-Products.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"473\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Boysenberry-Products.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Boysenberry-Products-200x146.jpg 200w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></a></p>\n<p>the full recipe on how to make a&nbsp;<strong>Knott’s&nbsp;Boysenberry&nbsp;Milkshake</strong>&nbsp;is below. here are some easy instructions on how to make it.</p>\n<p>first, in a blender,&nbsp;add the ice cream and milk. blend till smooth…</p>\n<p><a href=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/eat/recipe-eat/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/attachment/making-a-berry-milkshake/\" rel=\"attachment wp-att-20417\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-20417\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Making-a-Berry-Milkshake.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"894\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Making-a-Berry-Milkshake.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Making-a-Berry-Milkshake-145x200.jpg 145w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></a></p>\n<p>next, add the boysenberry punch concentrate.</p>\n<p><a href=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/eat/recipe-eat/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/attachment/knotts-punch-milkshake-recipe/\" rel=\"attachment wp-att-20425\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-20425\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Punch-Milkshake-Recipe.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"473\" srcset=\"https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Punch-Milkshake-Recipe.jpg 650w, https://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Punch-Milkshake-Recipe-200x146.jpg 200w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></a></p>\n<p>also add the boysenberry preserves. you can also add fresh berries at this time, about a handful. boysenberries are usually hard to find, so if you can’t find any, blackberries will work. the boysenberry, is a cross between a loganberry, red raspberry and blackberry, so they go perfect together.<a href=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/eat/recipe-eat/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake/attachment/knotts-boysenberry-milkshake-recipe/\" rel=\"attachment wp-att-20424\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-20424\" src=\"http://www.sandytoesandpopsicles.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Knotts-Boysenberry-Milkshake-Recipe.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"650\" height=\"473\" to&nbsp;<a href=\"http://www.discoverycube.org/oc/exhibits/bubblefest/\" target=\"_blank\">Bubblefest</a>&nbsp;at&nbsp;<strong>Discovery Cube</strong>, which&nbsp;happens every year during spring event that takes place at The Cube. when you see bubbles, you just have to smile….there’s just something about them.&nbsp;and Bubblefest sure does make a lot of&nbsp;smiles. this year’s Bubblefest runs <strong>April 1st – 16th.</strong></p>\n<p>here is Dani checking out the bubble show for her first time with my cousin!</p>\n<p><a 150w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px\"></a></p>\n<p><strong>Bubblefest</strong>&nbsp;at Discovery Cube has two parts to it. first there the&nbsp;<strong>Mega Bubblefest Laser
